markdownRemark.excerpt: I’ve updated the SecKit templates and guidance for Windows TA 6.0 no longer do you need to also deploy the TA for Microsoft DNS and TA for Microsoft AD!. Check…
markdownRemark.html:
I’ve updated the SecKit templates and guidance for Windows TA 6.0 no longer do you need to also deploy the TA for Microsoft DNS and TA for Microsoft AD!.

Check it out https://seckit.readthedocs.io/projects/splunk-ta-windows-seckit/en/latest/

frontmatter.title: SecKit for Splunk TA Windows is out
Redirecting _internal for a large forwarder deployment
